thread.title: Sadio Mane stat shows EXACTLY how much Liverpool missed him during the Africa Cup of Nations
thread.title_full: Sadio Mane stat shows EXACTLY how much Liverpool missed him during the Africa Cup of Nations

author: Mark Jones
title: Sadio Mane stat shows EXACTLY how much Liverpool missed him during the Africa Cup of Nations
text:
Sport Sadio Mane stat shows EXACTLY how much Liverpool missed him during the Africa Cup of Nations The Senegalese was back in the goals as Liverpool rolled over Spurs at Anfield, and you can see exactly how much he was missed during their slump Share Guess who's back? Back again? (Photo: Andrew Powell) Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's no wonder that Liverpool fans were missing Sadio Mane . 
The rapid Senegalese attacker was absent for most of the Reds' slump in January, but he scored his first goals since his return in the Reds' 2-0 victory over Tottenham at Anfield on Saturday. 
Mane first raced clear from the Spurs defence to open the scoring, and then just two minutes later he slammed home his second goal after initial efforts from Adam Lallana and Robert Firmino were kept out. Mane clips home his first (Photo: REUTERS) And slams home his second (Photo: PA) 
They were type of goals that Liverpool were missing throughout their miserable January, and they added to Mane's already impressive numbers during his first Liverpool season. 
He's now scored 11 times and assisted four goals for the Reds this season, numbers that they could certainly have done with in January. 
Get him back in your fantasy football teams, now! poll loading Will Liverpool finish in the Premier League's top four this season? 2000+ VOTES SO FAR
